Add sparkline to datagrid

Source: R/data-summary.R
add_sparkline.Rd

Add sparkline to datagrid

Usage

add_sparkline(
  grid,
  column = "vals",
  color.main = "#2a8484",
  color.sec = "#84EF84"
)

Arguments

grid

grid

column

clumn to transform

Value

datagrid

Examples

grid <- mtcars |>
  default_parsing() |>
  overview_vars() |>
  toastui::datagrid() |>
  add_sparkline()
grid
